Module com.cs2212.cardbound
Package com.cs2212.cardbound.system

Class Gameplay

java.lang.Object
com.cs2212.cardbound.system.Gameplay
public class Gameplay extends Object
A static class that manages various flags and global mechanics during gameplay.
Since:
3/15/2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jacob Couture
